title: Structuring Educational Practices in Growth
text: For me, 2025 will be remembered not just for achieving goals, but as a year of 'structuring and implementing educational practices as a growing educator.' By planning the webtoon 'Breath Stories' and the podcast 'Walking with Learning,' I've deeply realized that education is not merely about transmitting knowledge, but about 'a process of sharing, discussing, and evolving together.' I am concretizing my vision for a sustainable educational ecosystem by directly designing an after-school recording system, which ensures teachers' efforts and practices are documented and reintegrated into the educational field. Furthermore, I am continually seeking growth as an educator by sharing my deep reflections and insights from the alternative education scene through essays on the 'HamsungEdu Blog'.

title: Beginning Educational Research and Design
text: I started working as an educational researcher at 'Sesangieum,' a new educational organization. I am designing an educational practice platform and creating actual classroom-based tools, allowing me to design education from a broader perspective. At the same time, my own educational philosophy has become even clearer.

title: Inner Exploration and Collaborative Educational Practice
text: I participated in and completed the Teachers' College for Life, and obtained my clinical psychologist qualification. This was a period where I deeply realized that a teacher's role goes beyond just teaching, requiring observation of children's inner worlds. I also attempted integrated subject classes and economic education material creation, putting collaborative growth of teachers into practice.

title: Enhancing Professionalism based on Activity Fields
text: I obtained qualifications as a Web Design Technician and a Cognitive Counselor for Slow Learners, driven by a desire to 'understand more deeply and communicate better.' As an educational practitioner, I began learning tools to enhance my capabilities beyond just verbal explanations.

title: Career Transition, Intersection of Law and Education
text: While preparing for law school entrance exams, I deeply contemplated the intersection of 'law and education.' My experience passing the first stage and having an interview provided valuable time to reflect on my own direction. That year, by planning a metaverse festival using Gather Town, I also discovered the potential for technology and education to meet.

title: Developing Materials and Tools for Learning in Life
text: From eating and washing to economic board games, I directly produced teaching materials and tools that connected to children's lives, laying the foundation for realizing 'learning in life.' This reflects my philosophy that education cannot be separated from real life.

title: Enhancing Problem-Solving Skills
text: Facing complex educational issues, I developed my problem-solving skills. I gained experience in not just recognizing problems, but also finding and applying practical solutions.

title: Expanding Education, New Perspectives
text: I explored various educational models and approaches beyond traditional methods. This was a significant turning point that gave me a broader perspective on future education.

title: Experiment as an Educational Researcher Outside School
text: As a team leader for 'Aju Healthy Whisper,' I gained experience in educational research and program operation outside the school system. This period involved attempting meaningful education at the boundary between public and private sectors, broadening my scope of education.

title: Building a Collaborative Educational Environment
text: I strove to create a better educational environment through collaboration with other teachers. I realized that organic relationships with colleagues positively impact student growth.

title: Alternative Education, Between Anxiety and Conviction
text: I took my first steps as a teacher at Saramsarang Nanum School and grew into a team leader for Youth and Saramsarang, balancing Korean language instruction and life guidance. Despite initial anxieties in the alternative education setting, I gained conviction in growing together with the children.

title: Integration of Education and Counseling
text: During this period, I realized the importance of children's psychological stability and growth in the educational field, leading me to explore an integrated approach to education and counseling. This laid an important foundation for my future qualification as a clinical psychologist.

title: Homeroom Teacher, Learning the Depth of Relationships
text: Working as a homeroom teacher at Saramsarang Nanum School, I became deeply involved in children's daily lives. This was a valuable period where I learned that guidance is not a mere technique, but stems from genuine 'relationships' with children.

title: Career Counseling, Assisting Life's Path
text: While working as a content designer, I became interested in the keywords 'life and career,' and obtained my career counselor qualification, exploring another possibility beyond being a teacher. This broadened my perspective on how to assist people's lives.

title: Exploring the Link Between Life and Career
text: As a content designer, I developed a deep interest in the keywords 'life' and 'career.' This led to my desire to influence people's lives positively in a broader scope, beyond the traditional role of a teacher.

title: Prepared Teacher, Stepping into the World
text: I obtained my secondary school teacher qualifications in Korean Language and Moral Ethics and graduated from Dongguk University. This was the first step where the theory of learning began to move towards practice, completing my preparation as an educator.

title: Teacher Competency Forged through Diligence
text: I worked for five semesters at the school library through a librarian work-study scholarship, learning the value of consistency, and received 'Excellent' evaluation during my teaching practicum, demonstrating my practical competence. This was a period where I realized that 'diligence' could be my strongest asset.

title: First Steps in Teaching Practice
text: Through teaching practicum, I experienced the vivid reality of the classroom and learned to apply theory to practice by directly interacting with students. Receiving an 'Excellent' evaluation confirmed my capabilities as a teacher.

title: Exploring the Essence of Education
text: During this period, I deeply explored the essence of education, establishing the direction I should pursue. I began to dream of education that goes beyond mere knowledge transfer, aiming to foster the holistic growth of children.

title: Growth through Educational Volunteering
text: Through educational volunteering at a social welfare corporation, I experienced education in a real-world setting, moving beyond theoretical knowledge. Communicating with children, I felt the warmth of education and realized the reward of providing practical help.

title: Cultivating Qualities of a Future Teacher
text: In a time when dreams were just beginning, I was recognized for my potential as a teacher by winning an award in the 'Good Teacher Competition.' Concurrently pursuing teaching courses and a double major deepened my understanding of education, establishing my attitude as a teacher during this period.

title: First Encounter with Korean Language Education
text: After graduating from Gwangmyeongbuk High School, I entered Dongguk University, majoring in Korean Language Education, taking my first step as an educator. Although it was still vague, my desire to work in a field that touched people's lives was clear.
